00019 #ifndef _IPL98_PIXELGROUPCONSTIT_H
00020 #define _IPL98_PIXELGROUPCONSTIT_H
00021 
00022 #include "pixelgroup_it.h"
00023 
00024 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00025 
00037 class CPixelGroupConstIterator
00038 {
00039 protected: // attributes
00041     T2DInt* m_pCurr;
00042 public:
00044         CPixelGroupConstIterator(){ }
00046         CPixelGroupConstIterator(T2DInt* pCurr) :m_pCurr(pCurr){ }
00048         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& operator=(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& It);
00050         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& operator=(const CPixelGroupIterator& It);
00052         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& operator++() {++m_pCurr; return *this;}
00054         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator operator++(int) {CPixelGroupConstIterator t = *this; m_pCurr++; return t;}
00056         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& operator--() {--m_pCurr; return *this;}
00058         inline CPixelGroupConstIterator operator--(int) {CPixelGroupConstIterator t = *this; m_pCurr--; return t;}
00060         inline const T2DInt& operator*(){return *m_pCurr;}
00062         inline const T2DInt* operator->(){return m_pCurr;}
00066         inline CPoint2D<INT16> ToCPoint2D(){return CPoint2D<INT16>(m_pCurr->x,m_pCurr->y);}
00069         friend bool operator==(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& p, const CPixelGroupConstIterator& q){return p.m_pCurr==q.m_pCurr;}
00072         friend bool operator!=(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& p, const CPixelGroupConstIterator& q){return !(p==q);}
00075         friend bool operator<(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& p, const CPixelGroupConstIterator& q){return p.m_pCurr<q.m_pCurr;}
00078         friend bool operator<(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& p, const CPixelGroupIterator& q){return p.m_pCurr<&(*q);}
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& CPixelGroupConstIterator::operator=(const CPixelGroupConstIterator& It)
00083 {
00084         m_pCurr=It.m_pCurr;
00085         return *this;
00086 }
00087 
00088 inline CPixelGroupConstIterator& CPixelGroupConstIterator::operator=(const CPixelGroupIterator& It)
00089 {
00090         m_pCurr=&(*It);
00091         return *this;
00092 }
00093 
00094 } // end namespace ipl
00095 
00096 #endif //_IPL98_PIXELGROUPCONSTIT_H
